name: Celestial Collective
declaringWar: It has become apparent you refuse to accept the truth. Now we must force you to realize it.
attacked: You still hold on to the belief that your past sins are forgiven?
defeated: We now go to join Yánluó. The Collective endures forever in his embrace, while you, who reject his teachings, will crumble from within...
introduction: You will soon come to learn the Four Truths...
neutralHello: The Four Truths are all that matter in this world.
hateHello: You continue to suffer because you continue to reject our father in Death.
tradeRequest: This may help your people achieve enlightenment.
uniques: No damage penalty for wounded units
[-10]% Unhappiness from [Population] [in all cities] <when at war>
[-1] Happiness from each type of luxury resource
